skills.name: Poisonous Teeth
skills.description: Attacks the enemy 2 times and weakens the enemy's Defense and inflicts continuous damage for 2 turns with a 15% chance with each attack. The Attack Power increases according to Defense.

skill_effect.name: Continuous DMG
skill_effect.description: Deals 5% of monster's max HP as damage every turn

skill_effect.name: Multiple Hits
skill_effect.description: Attack hits more than 1 time per use.

skills.name: Poisonous Whirlwind
skills.description: Attacks all enemies dealing damage proportionate to your Defense and inflicts Continuous Damage for 3 turns with a 50% chance. The damage of this skill will increase by 30% for each harmful effect on the enemy.
skills.level_progress_description:
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +10%
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +10%
Cooltime Turn -1

skill_effect.name: AOE
skill_effect.description: Applies skill to more than one target

skill_effect.name: Continuous DMG
skill_effect.description: Deals 5% of monster's max HP as damage every turn

skills.name: Bone Scale (Passive)
skills.description: Reflects 10% of the inflicted damage to the attacker when attacked and provokes the attacker for 1 turn with a 30% chance. [Automatic Effect]

skill_effect.name: Auto Effect
skill_effect.description: The skill effect is automatically triggered.

skill_effect.name: Provoke
skill_effect.description: The monster is forced to only attack the monster which applied the effect

skill_effect.name: Reflect DMG
skill_effect.description: 33% of incoming damage is reflected back at the attacker. This does not nullify any Status Effects.
